workspaces.unlinkConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink this workspace from the issue? The workspace will still exist but will no longer be associated with this issue.
workspaces.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? This will unlink it from the issue and delete the local workspace. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Workspace
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace? This action cannot be undone.

notes.selectWorkspace: Select a workspace to view notes

repos.noReposAddedHint: Add one or more repositories to this workspace from the options below

dialogs.chooseExistingRepo: Choose an existing repository from your file system

projects.createFirstPrompt: Create a project first to start working on tasks.

betaWorkspaces.title: It's time to migrate!
betaWorkspaces.intro: We've rebuilt Vibe Kanban's UI from the ground up, and Workspaces is now the recommended way to use it.
betaWorkspaces.newUiDescription: The new UI is designed for day-to-day work: juggling agents, previewing changes, and reviewing code. It also unlocks features that aren't available in the old UI:

newFeatures.multiRepo: Edit multiple repositories at the same time
newFeatures.multiAgent: Run multiple agent conversations (even across different agents) in a single workspace
newFeatures.commandBar: Faster navigation with the command bar

betaWorkspaces.oldUiDescription: For now, a few things still live in the current UI:

oldFeatures.kanban: Managing tasks on the kanban board

betaWorkspaces.transition: During the transition over the next few weeks, you'll move between both views.
betaWorkspaces.optOutNote: Heads up: the legacy Local Projects view will be unavailable shortly and should no longer be used.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.content: Welcome to the Workspaces page. One view of the workspaces across all of your projects, and the fastest way to review work from your agents. Share feedback anytime via the navbar icon.

commandBar.title: Command Bar
commandBar.content: The command bar is your central hub for navigation. Open it with CMD+K to search and access every action available in a workspace.

contextBar.title: Context Bar
contextBar.content: The context bar lets you switch between panes quickly. Drag it wherever works best for you.

sidebar.title: Workspace Sidebar
sidebar.content: See the status of all your workspaces at a glance. Notifications highlight which ones need attention. Archive merged workspaces to keep your sidebar clean.

multiRepo.title: Multi-Repo Support
multiRepo.content: Add multiple repos to a single workspace. Reference code from one repo while working in another, or implement changes across several repos at once.

sessions.title: Multiple Sessions
sessions.content: Create multiple agent conversation sessions within a single workspace, including sessions with different agents. This helps you work around conversation limits or spin up review agents in separate threads.

preview.title: Preview Changes
preview.content: Preview your work in a built-in browser without switching contexts. Test across desktop, mobile, and custom viewport sizes.

diffs.title: Diffs and Comments
diffs.content: The redesigned diffs panel includes a file tree of your changes. Comment directly on diffs to give feedback to the agent, and view GitHub comments when your workspace is linked to a PR.

classicUi.title: Return to Classic UI
classicUi.content: Click the exit icon on the left side of the navbar to return to the classic kanban board. To disable the new UI entirely, update the "Enable Workspaces Beta" option under "Beta Features" in settings.

logs.selectProcessToView: Select a process to view logs

contextUsage.label: Context usage
contextUsage.emptyTooltip: Context usage appears after the next reply

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.sequentialHint: Sequential shortcuts: Press the first key, then the second within 500ms.
shortcuts.configurableHint: Configurable in Settings → General → Message Input

typeahead.missingRepo: Selected repo is no longer available.
typeahead.noCommands: No commands available for this agent.

kanban.noStatusesFound: No statuses found for this project
kanban.noVisibleStatuses: All statuses are hidden. Use display settings or switch to another tab to view issues.
kanban.createDraftWorkspaceDescription: Tick to automatically create a workspace

loginRequired.title: Sign in required
loginRequired.description: Please sign in to view this project.

kanban.filtersDescription: Adjust filters and sorting for this board view.
kanban.lastVisibleStatus: At least one status must be visible

intro.title: Welcome
intro.content: Welcome to Vibe Kanban. Use the help sections in this panel to learn how things work, then create your first issue. You can re-open this help dialog or give feedback anytime from the navbar.

welcome.title: Projects
welcome.content: The project page is where you manage issues. You can view your issues as a kanban board, or as a list, and filter by status, tag, assignee and more.

issues.title: Issues
issues.content: Each issue represents a feature or problem to solve. Issues have statuses, priorities, assignees, tags, relationships, comments, sub-issues and more.

workspaces.title: Workspaces
workspaces.content: To start working on an issue, create a workspace. A single issue can have multiple workspaces. Issues describe the work to be done, workspaces are where the work happens.

organizations.title: Invite your team
organizations.content: We've automatically created a personal organization, and initial project so you can easily get started with Vibe Kanban. You can also create new organizations and invite your team to collaborate.

headings.repoStep: Which repositories would you like to work on?
headings.chatStep: What would you like to work on?

migration.allProjectsMigrated: All your projects have already been migrated to the cloud.

kanban.title: Kanban Boards
kanban.description: Sign in to organise your coding agents with kanban boards.
